bind.value: _isEmptySlot ? ('empty_slot_' + _formationType) : isInBattle ? ('player_in_battle_' + _formationType + postfix) : _isWardog && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : _isWardog && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : isCommander && isReady ? ('commander_' + _formationType + postfix) : isCommander && !isReady ? ('commander_not_ready_' +_formationType + postfix) : !isCommander && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : !isCommander && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + postfix) : 'empty_slot_division'

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'TextInputWithCancelCustom'; isSearchingShipByName ? { onEnterEvent: 'startShipSearch', onCancelEvent: 'shipSearchCancelled', onInputStrChangedEvent: 'inputStrChanged', _onEnterTooltipText: 'IDS_HINT_FIND', _closeButtonTooltipText: 'IDS_HINT_RESET_FILTER', _defaultInputValue: searchStr, _maxChars: 20, _tfWidth: '250px'} : null

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'isVisible'; (field == 'IDS_RANKED_BATTLES' && (feature_16 == 'locked' || rankedBattlesSeason.denyReason & RBDeny.NO_SEASON)) ? false : (field == 'IDS_CLUB_BATTLES' && (feature_19 == 'locked' || clubBattlesSeasonId <= 0 || clubBattlesSeasonStage != 2)) ? false : ((field == 'IDS_WITH_COMMANDER' || field == 'IDS_WITHOUT_COMMANDER') && feature_13 == 'locked') ? false : true

bind.name: child

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'filterIcons'; selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.PVE_BATTLE ? 'pve' : selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.TRAINING_BATTLE ? 'training_room': selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.RANKED_BATTLE ? 'rank': selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.EVENT_BATTLE ? 'event' : 'no_icon'

bind.name: watch

'IDS_CUSTOM_ROOM' : selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.RANKED_BATTLE ? 'IDS_RANKED_BATTLES' : selectedBattle.type == BattleTypes.EVENT_BATTLE ? 'IDS_EVENTBATTLE' : 'UNKNOWN_BATTLE_TYPE'
